sentences.sContent: Local legend has it that (= says that ) the island was the original Garden of Eden.
sentences.sCn: 当地传说这个岛就是伊甸园的原型。

synos.tran: 传奇；说明；[测]图例；刻印文字

remMethod.val: 联想集团(原名Legend)总裁柳传志是一位传奇人物

trans.tranCn: 传说， 传奇故事； 传奇人物
trans.tranOther: an old, well-known story, often about brave people, adventures, or magical events
